qas.question: What was the model number of the slim version of the PlayStation 3?
What font was discontinued with the release of the slim model?
What would customers notice about the sound of the new, improved cooling system?
What did the boot screen on the game consoles read before Sony changed it to "PS3 PlayStation 3"?
What did Sony change about the PS3 games along with the packaging in 2009?
Sony announce what model on April 18, 2009?
Where did Sony announce the PS4 CECH-2000?
What model included increased power consumption?
What model stopped using the "Batman font"?
What model included a louder cooling system?

What font was continued with the release of the slim model?
What would customers notice about the sound of the new, improved heating system?
What did the boot screen on the game consoles read after Sony changed it to "PS3 PlayStation 3"?
What did Sony change about the PS3 games along with the packaging in 2008?

context: Following speculation that Sony was working on a 'slim' model, Sony officially announced the <b5_0><b7_0><b8_0><b9_0><b10_0>PS3 <a0_0>CECH-2000<b10_0/><b9_0/><b8_0/><b7_0/><b5_0/><a0_0/> model on August 18, 2009, at the <b6_0>Sony Gamescom press conference<b6_0/>. New features included a slimmer form factor, decreased power consumption, and a <a2_0><b12_0>quieter<b12_0/><a2_0/> cooling system. It was released in major territories by September 2009. As part of the release for the slim model, the console logo ceased using the "<a1_0><b11_0>Spider-Man font<b11_0/><a1_0/>" (the same font used for the title of Sony's Spider-Man 3) and the capitalized PLAYSTATION 3. It instead reverted to a more traditional PlayStation- and PlayStation 2-like 'PlayStation 3' logo with "PS3" imprinted on the console. Along with the redesigning of the console and logo, the boot screen of all consoles changed from <a3_0>"<b13_0>Sony Computer Entertainment<b13_0/>"<a3_0/> to "PS3 PlayStation 3", with a new chime and the game start splash screen being dropped. The <a4_0><b14_0>cover art<b14_0/><a4_0/> and packaging of games was also changed.
